mapper.sql: CARGO_ID, TRAILER_ID, CARGO_TYPE, FLOOR, PLACE, CARRY_OVER, CARGO_LONG, CARGO_WIDTH, CARGO_HIGH, CARGO_WEIGHT, CORP_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, FLAG

cargo.CARGO_ID, cargo.TRAILER_ID,trailer.TRAILER_CODE,trailer.TRAILER_NAME, cargo.CARGO_TYPE, cargo.FLOOR, cargo.PLACE, cargo.CARRY_OVER, cargo.CARGO_LONG, cargo.CARGO_WIDTH,cargo.CARGO_HIGH, cargo.CARGO_WEIGHT, cargo.CORP_ID,corp.CORP_NAME, cargo.CREATOR,user.USER_NAME AS CREATE_NAME,cargo.CREATE_DATE, cargo.FLAG

where cargo.del = 0 and cargo.CARGO_ID = #{cargoId} and cargo.TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId} and cargo.CARGO_TYPE = #{cargoType} and cargo.FLOOR = #{floor} and cargo.PLACE = #{place} and cargo.CARRY_OVER = #{carryOver} and cargo.CARGO_LONG = #{cargoLong} and cargo.CARGO_WIDTH = #{cargoWidth} and cargo.CARGO_HIGH = #{cargoHigh} and cargo.CARGO_WEIGHT = #{cargoWeight} and cargo.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and cargo.CREATOR = #{creator} and cargo.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and cargo.FLAG = #{flag} and CREATE_DATE >= #{startTime} and CREATE_DATE <= #{endTime}
mapper.insert: insert into bd_cargo (TRAILER_ID, CARGO_TYPE, FLOOR, PLACE, CARRY_OVER, CARGO_LONG, CARGO_WIDTH, CARGO_HIGH, CARGO_WEIGHT, CORP_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, FLAG) values (#{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cargoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{place,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carryOver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into bd_cargo TRAILER_ID, CARGO_TYPE, FLOOR, PLACE, CARRY_OVER, CARGO_LONG, CARGO_WIDTH, CARGO_HIGH, CARGO_WEIGHT, CORP_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, FLAG, #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cargoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{place,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carryOver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update bd_cargo TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CARGO_TYPE = #{cargoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PLACE = #{place,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARRY_OVER = #{carryOver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_LONG = #{cargoLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_WIDTH = #{cargoWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_HIGH = #{cargoHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_WEIGHT = #{cargoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where CARGO_ID = #{cargoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bd_cargo set TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CARGO_TYPE = #{cargoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PLACE = #{place,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARRY_OVER = #{carryOver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_LONG = #{cargoLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_WIDTH = #{cargoWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_HIGH = #{cargoHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_WEIGHT = #{cargoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CARGO_ID = #{cargoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from bd_cargo cargo ORDER BY cargo.CREATE_DATE DESC
select from bd_cargo cargo order by cargo.CREATE_DATE DESC
select from bd_cargo where del = 0 and flag = 0 and TRAILER_ID in #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
